Class DefaultLogEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.impl.DefaultLogEventFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogEventFactory

    public class DefaultLogEventFactory
extends Object
implements LogEventFactory
    Always creates new LogEvent instances.

      • createEvent

        public LogEvent createEvent(String loggerName,
                   Marker marker,
                   String fqcn,
                   Level level,
                   Message data,
                   List<Property> properties,
                   Throwable t)
        Creates a log event.
        Specified by:
        createEvent in interface LogEventFactory
        Parameters:
        loggerName - The name of the Logger.
        marker - An optional Marker.
        fqcn - The fully qualified class name of the caller.
        level - The event Level.
        data - The Message.
        properties - Properties to be added to the log event.
        t - An optional Throwable.
        Returns:
        The LogEvent.
